name: Bloodrush Demo
description:
Bloodrush is a top-down hack n' slash game with a dark fantasy aesthetic.

In Bloodrush, the player is encouraged to aggressively use its combat abilities to evade, control and destroy their opponents, moving around in a dance of destruction.

The game is set in the Kingdom of Jur, an once thriving realm beset by monsters. As the game goes on, more of the protagonist's mysterious motivations are revealed...
